css: .section-cta-newsletter-signup-yj { padding: 80px 0; background-color: var(--color-dark); color: var(--color-light); text-align: center; }.section-cta-newsletter-signup-yj .container { }.section-cta-newsletter-signup-yj .cta-content { max-width: 600px; margin: 0 auto; }.section-cta-newsletter-signup-yj .cta-title { font-size: clamp(2rem, 5vw, 3rem); font-family: var(--font-heading); margin-bottom: 15px; }.section-cta-newsletter-signup-yj .cta-description { font-size: 1.1rem; color: var(--color-secondary); margin-bottom: 30px; line-height: 1.6; }.section-cta-newsletter-signup-yj .cta-form { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 10px; flex-wrap: wrap; }.section-cta-newsletter-signup-yj .cta-input { padding: 15px 20px; border-radius: 50px; border: 1px solid var(--color-border); background-color: var(--color-surface-1); color: var(--color-dark); flex-grow: 1; min-width: 200px; outline: none; font-size: 1rem; }.section-cta-newsletter-signup-yj .cta-input::placeholder { color: var(--color-secondary); }.section-cta-newsletter-signup-yj .cta-button { padding: 15px 30px; background-color: var(--color-primary); color: var(--color-light); border: none; border-radius: 50px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease; }.section-cta-newsletter-signup-yj .cta-button:hover { background-color: var(--color-dark); border-color: var(--color-primary); }.section-cta-newsletter-signup-yj .container { padding: 0 20px; }@media (max-width: 600px) {.section-cta-newsletter-signup-yj .cta-form { flex-direction: column; align-items: center; } .section-cta-newsletter-signup-yj .cta-input, .section-cta-newsletter-signup-yj .cta-button { width: 90%; }}

en.cta_subheadline: Join our community and get the latest news and exclusive offers directly to your inbox.

de.cta_subheadline: Treten Sie unserer Community bei und erhalten Sie die neuesten Nachrichten und exklusiven Angebote direkt in Ihren Posteingang.
